---
title: "Survey Team"
output: html_document
---

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = F}

sub_docs <- subset(x = site, section == "Survey Team")

string <- ""

for (irow in 1:nrow(sub_docs)) {
  string <- paste0(string,
            paste0("[", sub_docs$title[irow], "](../",
                   sub_docs$url_loc[irow], ")", "<br><br>")
            )
}

cat(string)
```
